sentences.sContent: The book was subsequently translated into 15 languages.
sentences.sCn: 该书后来被译成 15 种语言。

sentences.sContent: Subsequently, the company filed for bankruptcy.
sentences.sCn: 随后，该公司申请了破产。

sentences.sContent: ...These strains were subsequently planted in test plots at Ludhiana...
...He managed to convince Borlaug to help with his new effort and subsequently founded the Sasakawa Africa Association...
...India subsequently made a huge commitment to Mexican wheat...

trans.tranOther: after an event in the past
